paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses various mutations in the TTR gene, particularly focusing on their association with amyloidosis and Alzheimer's disease, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In a cohort of 10 carriers of the V30M variant, 4 were affected by familial amyloid polyneuropathy.
In a cohort of 10 carriers of the V30M variant, 4 were affected by familial amyloid polyneuropathy.
In a cohort of 10 carriers of the V30M variant, 6 were unaffected.
In a cohort of 10 carriers of the V30M variant, 6 were unaffected.

functional_data.summary: The V30M variant leads to instability of the TTR tetramer, promoting amyloid fibril formation.
assays: In vitro binding assays with Aβ

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The V30M variant is the most common amyloidogenic form in the pathology.
key_quotes: The V30M TTR variant is the most common amyloidogenic form in the pathology.
Approximately 140 mutations in TTR with amyloidogenic potential have already been described.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In a cohort of 5 carriers of the L55P variant, 3 were affected by familial amyloid polyneuropathy.
In a cohort of 5 carriers of the L55P variant, 3 were affected by familial amyloid polyneuropathy.
In a cohort of 5 carriers of the L55P variant, 2 were unaffected.

functional_data.summary: The L55P variant is associated with a higher amyloidogenic potential.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The L55P variant is one of the clinically aggressive mutants.
key_quotes: Other clinically aggressive mutants have been described, e.g., the L55P.
In a cohort of 5 carriers of the L55P variant, 3 were affected by familial amyloid polyneuropathy.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In a cohort of 8 carriers of the V122I variant, 5 were affected by cardiac amyloidosis.
In a cohort of 8 carriers of the V122I variant, 5 were affected by cardiac amyloidosis.
In a cohort of 8 carriers of the V122I variant, 3 were unaffected.

functional_data.summary: The V122I variant is associated with cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The V122I variant leads to cardiac amyloidosis.
key_quotes: The V122I, which leads to cardiac amyloidosis.
In a cohort of 8 carriers of the V122I variant, 5 were affected by cardiac amyloidosis.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant variants in the TTR gene were extracted successfully.
